translation.en: [narrator] Ah, Winchester University.
translation.zh:
（便会开始审视
对其进行教育的社会） （引自詹姆斯鲍德温） 温彻斯特大学

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: The writers of this program are depending on my ethnic but nonthreatening voice
translation.zh:
这个节目的编剧
要靠我这副种族性强 但不具威胁的嗓子来解释一些

translation.en: to explain things they are too lazy to set up traditionally.
translation.zh: 但不具威胁的嗓子来解释一些 他们不愿用传统方法呈现的内容

translation.en: Only two months into the semester,
translation.zh:
本学期才开始两个月
这所常春藤联盟第九大学

translation.en: and already the ninth Ivy League's quads buzz
translation.zh:
本学期才开始两个月
这所常春藤联盟第九大学 （温彻斯特大学）

translation.en: with future Olympians and presidents,
translation.zh: 已经充斥着未来的奥运选手和总统

translation.en: with innovators trying to crack the next Facebook,
translation.zh:
还有梦想建立
下一个社交网站巨头的创新者们

translation.en: with diverse students being forced into group shots
translation.zh: 各种各样的学生被逼去照大合影

translation.en: -for the admissions brochure. -[camera shutter clicks]
translation.zh: 用做招生宣传册的照片

translation.en: One of Winchester's most well-known groups is the humor magazine Pastiche,
translation.zh:
温彻斯特大学最著名的团体之一
是幽默杂志《临摹》

translation.en: whose members have left their mark as satirists,
translation.zh: 其成员的自我标签是讽刺作家

translation.en: television writers, and most recently...
translation.zh: 电视编剧 最近增加了

translation.en: hosts of a blackface party.
translation.zh: “黑脸派对”的举办人

translation.en: [man] Yeah!
translation.zh: （三天前）

translation.en: [narrator] Ah, look, Serena Williams.
translation.zh: 看 网球名将小威廉姆斯

translation.en: -That's an actual Black person. -[cell phone camera shutter clicks]
translation.zh: 这是个真正的黑人

translation.en: That's... I guess Nicki Minaj? I'm not sure.
translation.zh: 这位…我猜是妮琪米娜？我不确定

translation.en: Even more blackface.
translation.zh: 还有更多的黑脸

translation.en: Apparently this is a thing that white children are into.
translation.zh: 显然 这是白人小孩热衷的活动

translation.en: Google it.
translation.zh: 去网上查查就知道

translation.en: If you couldn't tell, there's lots more going on at this party...
translation.zh:
怕大家没看出来
其实派对上发生的事

translation.en: -[cheering] -[narrator] ...than meets the eye.
translation.zh: 远超过眼前所见

translation.en: Oh, more actual Black people. I wonder if they'll find this amusing.
translation.zh:
更多真正的黑人
不知道他们是否觉得这很好笑

translation.en: -[woman] How dare you? -[man] This is bullshit.
translation.zh:
-你们好大的胆子
-真是见鬼

translation.en: -[man] What the hell is this? -[woman] You are not Beyoncé. -[screaming] -[glass shatters]
translation.zh:
-搞什么鬼？
-你不是碧昂斯

translation.en: [narrator] They do not.
translation.zh: 他们不觉得好笑

translation.en: [man] Everyone back in the house right now! Drinks down!
translation.zh: 所有人回宿舍里 放下饮料

translation.en: [narrator] Unpacking this egregious event will take some time,
translation.zh: 详述这一骇人事件需要不少时间

translation.en: but an excellent place to begin our saga is with Samantha White,
translation.zh:
这个长篇故事
可以先从萨曼莎怀特开始讲起

translation.en: a junior media studies major and local provocateur.
translation.zh:
她是主修媒体研究的大三学生
也是本校激进分子

translation.en: Slavery in America.
translation.zh: 美国的奴隶制度

translation.en: Anybody like to volunteer to lead the discussion?
translation.zh: 有人自愿给我们的讨论开个头吗？

translation.en: [narrator] As one of the few Black faces in this mostly white place...
translation.zh:
作为白脸为主的校园内
少数的黑脸之一

translation.en: -[man] Anyone? -[narrator] ...Sam had become
translation.zh: 有人吗？ 萨姆习惯了这样的情节

translation.en: used to episodes like this...
translation.zh: 萨姆习惯了这样的情节

translation.en: [man] Anyone with some special connection to the material?
translation.zh: 和这一内容有特殊联系的人呢？

translation.en: [narrator] ...and run-ins like these.
translation.zh: 也习惯了这样的插曲

translation.en: You look like Beyoncé.
translation.zh: 你长得很像碧昂丝

translation.en: Storm from the X-Men.
translation.zh: 《X战警》里的暴风女

translation.en: Wait, what are you?
translation.zh: 慢着 你到底是什么？

translation.en: [narrator] Sam had enough and took to Winchester's syndicated student radio station.
translation.zh:
萨姆受够了
便在校联合学生电台表达不满

translation.en: Dear white people, here's a little tip.
translation.zh: 亲爱的白种人 给你们点小提示

translation.en: When you ask someone who looks ethnically different, "What are you?"
translation.zh:
当你问外表看起来属于不同种族的人
“你是什么？”时

translation.en: the answer is usually, "A person about to slap the shit out of you."
translation.zh:
答案通常是
“要把你打得连你妈都认不出来的人”

translation.en: [narrator] While Sam's show, aptly titled Dear White People,
translation.zh:
萨姆的节目有个适宜的名字
《亲爱的白种人》

translation.en: garnered a diverse set of listeners...
translation.zh: 并且收获了一批背景多样化的听众

translation.en: Who is this chick?
translation.zh: 并且收获了一批背景多样化的听众 这个女生是谁？

translation.en: [narrator] ...others was butthurt.
translation.zh: （失踪 黑人文化） 其他人则觉得蛋疼

translation.en: Keeping with its vow to mock anyone deemed too self-important,
translation.zh:
为坚守誓言
嘲讽所有妄自尊大者

translation.en: Pastiche set out to take down Samantha White
translation.zh: 《临摹》着手准备拿下萨曼莎怀特

translation.en: by throwing a politically incorrect party
translation.zh: 他们要举办一场政治不正确的派对

translation.en: for all those burdened by her demands
translation.zh:
（失踪 言论自由） 给所有因萨姆呼吁种族敏感性
而不堪重负的人

translation.en: for racial sensitivity.
translation.zh:
给所有因萨姆呼吁种族敏感性
而不堪重负的人

translation.en: However, after pressure from the administration,
translation.zh: 但是 鉴于校行政部门的压力

translation.en: -the party was canceled. -[electronic beep]
translation.zh: 派对取消

translation.en: But somehow, unbeknownst to Pastiche,
translation.zh:
但不知为何
在《临摹》不知情之下

translation.en: an invite went out anyway.
translation.zh: 邀请还是发出去了

translation.en: And it is here we find Sam and her camera,
translation.zh:
我们在这里找到了
带着摄像机的萨姆

translation.en: at the epicenter of one of the biggest scandals to hit Winchester so far.
translation.zh:
她站在迄今为止
温彻斯特大学最大丑闻的中心

translation.en: And like most parties, the hangover from this one...
translation.zh:
和大多数派对一样
这场派对之后的宿醉…

translation.en: is a motherfucker.
translation.zh: 也是个混账场面

translation.en: Dear white people, here's a list of acceptable Halloween costumes:
translation.zh:
亲爱的白种人 以下是可接受的
万圣节造型清单

translation.en: a pirate, slutty nurse, any of our first 43 presidents.
translation.zh:
海盗 淫荡护士
还有我们的前43任总统们

translation.en: Top of the list of unacceptable costumes: me.
translation.zh: 不可接受的造型清单的首位：扮成我

translation.en: Winchester couldn't get through 2017 without blackface? ♪ 'Cause I really don't care ♪
translation.zh:
温彻斯特学生不画成黑脸
没法过完2017年吗？

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. Am I being too loud for you?
translation.zh: 对不起 我是不是吵到你了？

translation.en: You know I stay woke, Sam,
translation.zh: 你知道我一直醒着 萨姆

translation.en: but right now, I'm getting the tea on how to be waist thin and ass thick from this white bitch in Texas.
translation.zh:
但现在 我要跟着德州白种贱人学习
如何瘦腰丰臀

translation.en: Okay, one, you're gorge.
translation.zh:
但现在 我要跟着德州白种贱人学习
如何瘦腰丰臀 好了 第一 你很美

translation.en: And, two, is "white bitch in Texas" her government name?
translation.zh:
第二 这个“德州白种贱人”
有个正式名字吗？

translation.en: Her name's Marian Updike, and she's the founder
translation.zh: 她叫玛丽安厄普代克

translation.en: of the Think Slim online course,
translation.zh: 她是“纤细思维”在线课程的创办人

translation.en: and she be dropping the knowledge I need to drop my sophomore 16.
translation.zh: 她在教我如何甩掉大二身材

translation.en: -[cell phone buzzes] -Not a thing.
translation.zh: 一派胡言

translation.en: [woman] I'm learning how to enjoy a decadent McRib.
translation.zh: 我正在学习享受堕落的猪排堡 （你令我疯狂）

translation.en: Miss Updike told me to cut it into fourths and count my chews.
translation.zh:
厄普代克小姐告诉我切成四段
然后数咀嚼次数

translation.en: Thirty, by the way.
translation.zh: 对了 要嚼30下

translation.en: [Sam] I can't with you, and what's more, I won't.
translation.zh: 真受不了你 不理你了

translation.en: -[woman chuckles] -Look. For those of you who thought our ivory tower
translation.zh: 听着 那些觉得我们的象牙塔

translation.en: was immune to this type of shit...
translation.zh: 对这种不公现象有免疫力的人

translation.en: -[alarm ringing] -[man] Wake up! Wake up! Wake up!
translation.zh: 醒来吧…

translation.en: Okay, I'm pretty sure the McRib was invented by Republicans in the '80s
translation.zh:
好吧 我确信猪排堡
是共和党人在80年代发明的

translation.en: to destroy Black communities, along with crack and Jerry Springer.
translation.zh:
与可卡因和杰里斯普林格一样
是用来消灭黑人社区的

translation.en: Suck it, Reagan. I'm still here.
translation.zh: 去他的里根总统 我还活得好好的

translation.en: And please know that I will be showing up on McRib day
translation.zh: 记住 猪排堡日我会出现

translation.en: in a Shirley Chisholm T-shirt sans internal conflict.
translation.zh:
穿着印有雪莉奇泽姆的T恤
内心波澜不惊

translation.en: Is McRib day a thing?
translation.zh: 真有猪排堡日吗？

translation.en: Where are you getting these Shirley Chisholm T-shirts?
translation.zh: 你在哪里买这种T恤？

translation.en: Forever 21. Girl, you know I have no shame. -Well... -[cell phone buzzing]
translation.zh: 平价服装店 姑娘 你知道我不知羞耻

translation.en: -Aside from my one secret shame. -Only one?
translation.zh:
-除了一件秘密事
-只有一件吗？ （马上过来）

translation.en: Sam, I've been secretly streaming The Cosby Show.
translation.zh:
萨姆 我正在偷偷在线收看
《科斯比一家》

translation.en: My conscience? Riddled with guilt.
translation.zh: 我的良心？现在已经充满罪恶感

translation.en: [Sam] It's just really convenient
translation.zh: 不过爆出丑闻的时间也真巧

translation.en: that this all came out once white people realized
translation.zh:
不过爆出丑闻的时间也真巧 正好在白人意识到
他富到可以买下电视台时

translation.en: he was rich enough to buy NBC.
translation.zh:
正好在白人意识到
他富到可以买下电视台时

translation.en: I mean, he probably did that shit. I'm just saying.
translation.zh: 我也只是说说而已 丑闻可能是真的

translation.en: Yeah, probably.
translation.zh: 对 有可能

translation.en: All right, y'all. Five minutes left for call-ins. Give me your worst.
translation.zh:
各位 还有五分钟打进电话的时间
放马过来

translation.en: [man] I find your show offensive and highly divisive.
translation.zh:
我只想说 我觉得你的节目令人反感
并且造成分裂

translation.en: We need to come together at times like this.
translation.zh: 现在这种情况 我们要团结在一起

translation.en: [Sam] Are you a white male? [man] Why? Race is a social construct.
translation.zh:
-你是白人男性吗？
-怎么了？种族是社会构成

translation.en: [Sam] I'll take that as a yes. Look, I didn't create the divide.
translation.zh: 就当你是白人 我没有造成分裂

translation.en: I'm just calling attention to it.
translation.zh: 我只是唤起大家的注意 （贝塞特楼）

translation.en: [woman] "Dear White People"?
translation.zh: 《亲爱的白种人》？

translation.en: Even you have to admit your show comes off aggressive.
translation.zh:
就连你也必须承认
你的节目咄咄逼人

translation.en: [Sam] Dear White People is a misnomer.
translation.zh: “亲爱的白种人”是用词不当

translation.en: My show is meant to articulate the feelings of a misrepresented group outside the majority.
translation.zh:
我的节目旨在清楚表达
处在主流以外的被曲解群体的感受

translation.en: I get it.
translation.zh: 我明白

translation.en: The realization that you contribute to a racist society can be unsettling,
translation.zh:
意识到自己促成社会中的种族歧视
的确令人不安

translation.en: but you sound like a grown-ass woman to me.
translation.zh: 但你听起来像个成熟的女性

translation.en: Next.
translation.zh: 下一位

translation.en: Listen, the man could take an episode about Rudy getting a B-minus
translation.zh: 这个男人能把鲁迪考试得了B-

translation.en: and stretch it into a half hour of comedic gold.
translation.zh: 拉长讲成半小时的喜剧经典

translation.en: Oh, God, I pray he didn't stretch little Rudy out in any other way.
translation.zh: 老天 我祈祷别把小鲁迪拉弯

translation.en: -Bitch, you going to hell. -I'll save you a seat.
translation.zh:
-贱人 你要下地狱
-我帮你留个位子

translation.en: [man] Thanks for saying what we're all thinking.
translation.zh: 姐妹 多谢你说出我们的想法

translation.en: Sometimes, I feel like I don't belong on my own campus.
translation.zh: 有时候我觉得自己不属于这个学校

translation.en: [Sam] Right?
translation.zh:
对吧？他们忙着为让我们入学
而沾沾自喜

translation.en: They too busy patting themselves on the back for letting us in.
translation.zh:
对吧？他们忙着为让我们入学
而沾沾自喜 （阿姆斯特朗帕克
历代黑人宿舍）

translation.en: Hey, thanks for hanging out during the show.
translation.zh:
（阿姆斯特朗帕克
历代黑人宿舍） 多谢你在广播时陪我

translation.en: You give me shit, but if I wasn't there to talk about the McRib...
translation.zh:
你让我不好过 但如果我没在那里
跟你聊猪排堡…

translation.en: Shit would get way too real for a Monday morning.
translation.zh: 周一早上才是真的不好过

translation.en: [chuckles] I got you, always. We chilling before Black Caucus?
translation.zh:
我永远支持你
黑人核心会议前要一起玩吗？

translation.en: -I got plans. -Hmm.
translation.zh: 我有安排了

translation.en: Dick-related plans? Ain't nobody got time for no dick.
translation.zh:
-和“小弟弟”有约？
-没人有时间玩这个

translation.en: Not even Reggie's?
translation.zh: 连雷吉的都不行吗？

translation.en: He's coming over here. Anyway, I gotta cut my footage for doc class.
translation.zh:
他过来了
我是要为纪录片课剪辑视频

translation.en: Just text me when you're going down.
translation.zh: 你下来时给我发短信好了

translation.en: Hmm, how about you text me when you're done going down, mm-kay?
translation.zh: 不如你结束堕落时 给我发短信吧？

translation.en: You...
translation.zh: 你这个家伙

translation.en: -What's up, Sam? -Hey. 'Sup, Reggie?
translation.zh:
-你好吗？萨姆
-你好吗？雷吉

translation.en: So, uh, what you up to?
translation.zh: 你有什么安排？

translation.en: Did you, uh...
translation.zh: 你有没有…

translation.en: [laughs] Twice.
translation.zh: 两次

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: That's such an unfair advantage.
translation.zh: 真是个不公平的优势

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在做什么？

translation.en: Uh, crushing candy. -Right after? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh:
-玩糖果消除游戏
-做完就玩？

translation.en: What level are you on?
translation.zh: 你玩到多少级了？

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no. -Absolutely not. -What?
translation.zh:
-错了…这样绝对不行
-什么？

translation.en: You're supposed to spread all this jelly, you know.
translation.zh: 你应该把这些果冻喷出来

translation.en: -Ew. -It's not "ew." It's imperative to the game. Look.
translation.zh: 不恶心 这是游戏的关键 看着

translation.en: -Come here. Okay. -[clears throat]
translation.zh: 过来 好的

translation.en: Look, this is why you're still stuck on level 20.
translation.zh: 所以你一直卡在第20关

translation.en: Yeah? Spreading this digital goo.
translation.zh: 把这个电子粘液喷出来

translation.en: This is one of the most pressing issues of our time.
translation.zh: 这是最迫切的问题

translation.en: Okay, you gonna give me my phone back, though.
translation.zh: 你得把手机还给我

translation.en: What? No.
translation.zh: 什么？不

translation.en: -Gabe. -What?
translation.zh:
-加布
-怎么了？

translation.en: Give me my phone back.
translation.zh: 把手机还给我

translation.en: I don't know what you're talking about.
translation.zh: 我不知道你在说什么

translation.en: -Gabe. -No.
translation.zh:
-不
-加布 不

translation.en: [Gabe] You're so silly.
translation.zh:
-你真傻
-加布

translation.en: What? You want this?
translation.zh: 怎么了？ 你想要这样吗？不要吗？不要？

translation.en: -You don't want it? -Mnh-mnh. -No? -[laughing]
translation.zh: 你想要这样吗？不要吗？不要？

translation.en: [Gabe] You think you're so slick. Okay, no, no, no, no. -No, no. -What? What?
translation.zh:
-你以为你很机灵
-好了 别这样…

translation.en: Stop, you're gonna mess up my hair.
translation.zh:
-怎么了？
-停下 你会弄乱我的头发

translation.en: -Huh? -Like, more.
translation.zh: 弄得更乱

translation.en: Yeah, I am.
translation.zh: 我就要

translation.en: I'm gonna mess up that hair like a light drizzle on a much too humid day.
translation.zh:
我会弄乱你的头发
就像潮湿天气的毛毛雨一样

translation.en: -[phone buzzing] -[laughing]
translation.zh: （雷吉：你在哪里？）

translation.en: [clears throat] Reggie wants you.
translation.zh: 雷吉找你

translation.en: [groans] Shit.
translation.zh: 见鬼

translation.en: I'm supposed to represent for the BSU at this caucus.
translation.zh:
我应该代表黑人学生会
参加核心会议的

translation.en: Reggie's a...
translation.zh: 雷吉是个…

translation.en: Reggie's a cool guy.
translation.zh: 雷吉是个不错的小伙儿

translation.en: Yeah, except for when he corners you with a "'Sup?"
translation.zh: 对 除了把你逼到角落问“还好？”

translation.en: Or a "So..." Ellipses implied.
translation.zh: 或是蕴含潜台词的“那么…”

translation.en: You guys gonna talk about the party? What else?
translation.zh:
-你们要谈派对的事吗？
-还能有什么？

translation.en: Man, it's just so fucked.
translation.zh: 这事真是过分

translation.en: You know I could, uh-- I could come with.
translation.zh: 我可以…和你一起去

translation.en: No, it's cool. It's, um... It's members only.
translation.zh: 不 不用了 只有会员能参加

translation.en: So... you're a shark.
translation.zh: 那么 你是鲨鱼

translation.en: -That's cool. I get that. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 没事 我懂

translation.en: You know, you're always moving, and you only slow down to kill...
translation.zh:
你总是在不停地游
停下来就是为了杀…

translation.en: Gabe, I know how analogies work.
translation.zh: 加布 我知道类比是什么意思

translation.en: I guess what I'm saying is, you know, it's, uh...
translation.zh: 我想我要说的是

translation.en: You know, romance in a place like this,
translation.zh: 浪漫在这个地方 已经沦落成了…

translation.en: it's been reduced to, like, hooking up, you know?
translation.zh:
浪漫在这个地方 已经沦落成了… -炮友关系
-浪漫

translation.en: Mm, romance.
translation.zh:
-炮友关系
-浪漫

translation.en: [Gabe] It doesn't exist here.
translation.zh: 这里没有浪漫

translation.en: I want to be more than just a hot lay for you, Sam.

translation.en: Black Caucus is when the different Black student unions

黑人核心会议就是温彻斯特
各个不同的黑人学生会

translation.en: at Winchester get together for a completely masturbatory
translation.zh:
黑人核心会议就是温彻斯特
各个不同的黑人学生会 假借团结的名义来一番自我抚慰
并且展开一番唇枪舌剑的聚会

translation.en: and pointless pissing contest under the guise of unity.
translation.zh:
假借团结的名义来一番自我抚慰
并且展开一番唇枪舌剑的聚会

translation.en: or AASU, which basically does nothing

还有非裔美国学生会 简称AASU 基本上什么也不做

translation.en: and takes credit for the work of the BSU.

基本上什么也不做
但抢了黑人学生会的功劳

搞得好像他不是你爸似的

-你好 特洛伊

我相信你对这些优秀团体的描述

一半国内生产总值吗？

你头上不也顶着印度
一半国内生产总值吗？ -她们有过节

应该有人记下来 -小记者 记下了吗？

萨姆 我们是在评论区认识的
你写的文章是

《别爱上你的压迫者：
温彻斯特黑人女生爱情指引》

你却选了
一个还不如麦克莫的人？

我以为我知道自己要什么
但和他在一起 我不知道…

translation.en: I... [sighs]

我们引用非主流电影
我们看《权力的游戏》

我们引用非主流电影
我们看《权力的游戏》 说世界上有龙的电视剧吗？

说世界上有龙的电视剧吗？
剧中只有奴隶是黑人

translation.en: Hey.

translation.en: Okay.

-你有牛仔裤吗？

在这种情况下
你想要我盗用你的文化

translation.en: No, I--

translation.en: -That's-- -Coming?
translation.zh:
-其实…
-来吗？

translation.en: Oh, God. Since when do you even wear sweatpants?
translation.zh: 老天 你什么时候开始穿运动裤的？

translation.en: [Gabe] I wear them all the time. You're always taking 'em off of me.
translation.zh: 我一直在穿 总是被你脱掉

translation.en: Well, shit, Sam, if I knew you liked 'em light, I woulda hollered.
translation.zh:
见鬼 萨姆 如果知道你喜欢浅肤色
我早就大叫引起你注意了

translation.en: Hey, I'm Gabe.
translation.zh:
（我真的不能） -你好 我是加布
-乔蕾

translation.en: Joelle.
translation.zh:
-你好 我是加布
-乔蕾

translation.en: You listen to me, and you listen very carefully.
translation.zh: 你听我说 仔细地听

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 真棒

translation.en: Yes, coat. And the boots.
translation.zh:
-加油
-衣服和靴子真漂亮

translation.en: [woman] You do not own me.
translation.zh: 你没有拥有我 我不是你的财产

translation.en: I am not your property. You do not look.
translation.zh: 你没有拥有我 我不是你的财产 你不能看 不能碰 不能摸

translation.en: You do not touch. You do not grope.
translation.zh: 你不能看 不能碰 不能摸

translation.en: And you definitely do not pinch my ass
translation.zh: 更不能在白宫记者晚宴上

translation.en: at the White House Correspondents' Dinner.
translation.zh: 捏我的屁股

translation.en: -[woman] Yes! -[indistinct chatter]
translation.zh: 好棒

translation.en: [woman] He's cheating.
translation.zh: 他出轨了

translation.en: Well, you don't seem to mind any other time.
translation.zh: 其他时候你好像都不介意

translation.en: There were cameras there.
translation.zh: 那里有摄像机

translation.en: Roland Martin was a mere two feet away,
translation.zh: 罗兰马丁就在旁边

translation.en: and we all know how he loves to blast people on Twitter.
translation.zh: 他爱在社交网站上揭人丑闻

translation.en: I'm still in therapy from the last time I was trending.
translation.zh:
我上次上热搜后
现在还在看心理医生

translation.en: -But I'm in love with you. -[man] You better tell him.
translation.zh:
-但我爱着你
-你得告诉他

translation.en: Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 拿下他…

translation.en: You are the leader of the free world. You don't get to fall in love.
translation.zh:
你是自由世界的领袖
你不能爱上某人

translation.en: And what about you?
translation.zh: 那你呢？

translation.en: I'm in love with my job,
translation.zh: 我爱着我的工作

translation.en: which is to get little bitch babies like you to act like grown-ass men
translation.zh:
就是让你这种爱发牢骚的孩子
成为成熟的男人

translation.en: when the world needs them to do their job.
translation.zh: 去完成世界期待你完成的工作

translation.en: -[all exclaiming] -That's my girl.
translation.zh: 好样的

translation.en: 'Cause she gotta say something to him, right?
translation.zh: 她必须对他说些什么 对吗？

translation.en: -I mean... -Well, I've got a job for you.
translation.zh: 她必须对他说些什么 对吗？ 我有份工作给你

translation.en: Blow me. Right here in the Oval Office.
translation.zh: 为我口交 就在这里 在总统办公室

translation.en: On that eagle!
translation.zh: 在那只老鹰上

translation.en: Oh, hell no.
translation.zh: 当然不行

translation.en: Yes, Mr. President.
translation.zh: 是 总统先生

translation.en: -No! -[all] Oh! [Joelle] What? Are you serious?
translation.zh: 不 什么？你是认真的吗？

translation.en: I pledge allegiance to your cock.
translation.zh: 我宣誓对你的老二效忠

translation.en: -Wow. Wow. Wow. -She nasty.
translation.zh: 她真下流

translation.en: Daddy?
translation.zh: 爸爸？

translation.en: -I can't. -Okay, wait, wait.
translation.zh:
-受不了
-等等 那是谁？

translation.en: -So who is that? -That's her father.
translation.zh:
-受不了
-等等 那是谁？ 那是她父亲

translation.en: Well, actually a clone of her father who works undercover for the CIA
translation.zh:
那是她父亲的克隆人
在中情局当卧底

translation.en: after her real father's untimely death. Provided the perfect cover.
translation.zh:
在她生父英年早逝后
正好提供完美的掩护

translation.en: That's a little, uh-- that's a little far-fetched.
translation.zh: 这有点…牵强吧

translation.en: [Rashid] Does every American show revolve around fellatio-related cliffhangers?
translation.zh:
美国电视剧都围绕着
与口交有关的悬念吗？

translation.en: Hey, it's in our Constitution.
translation.zh: 这是我们宪法里规定的

translation.en: Black lives are degraded without regard, and we in here watching TV.
translation.zh:
黑人的身份被贬低没人管
我们却在这里看电视

translation.en: This is how the revolution dies.
translation.zh: 革命就是这样消亡的

translation.en: Hey, I was thinking we should have a sit-in.
translation.zh: 我在想我们应该静坐抗议

translation.en: Maybe in Bechet's dining hall?
translation.zh: 在贝塞特楼的餐厅怎么样？

translation.en: Where the white legacy kids live? [Sam] Exactly.
translation.zh:
-那些白人关系户住的地方？
-没错

translation.en: Engage the part of the student body that has the luxury of ignoring us.
translation.zh: 引起无视我们的那部分学生的注意

translation.en: Not everything we do has to be geared toward white people, Sam.
translation.zh: 我们做的不必全针对白人 萨姆

translation.en: Hey, is this about the party? [Reggie] Nah.
translation.zh:
-是因为派对的事吗？
-不是

translation.en: We planning to protest the library. Too many books in that motherfucker.
translation.zh:
我们在计划抗议图书馆
那混账地方的书太多了

translation.en: You know, in 2017, I can't believe something like this could happen.
translation.zh:
我只是…都2017年了
我不敢相信还发生了这样的事

translation.en: Really? 'Cause I can.
translation.zh: 是吗？我能相信

translation.en: I mean, it's almost like you and I attend two totally separate schools.
translation.zh:
就好像你和我
读的是两个不同的学校

translation.en: Hey, man, I'm just as pissed off as you are.
translation.zh: 老兄 我只是和你们一样生气

translation.en: -Not possible. -[Gabe] No, uh--
translation.zh: 不可能 不…我不是这个意思 我是说…

translation.en: Look, that's not what I meant.
translation.zh: 不…我不是这个意思 我是说…

translation.en: Bro, just because you got a Black chick on your arm
translation.zh: 兄弟 你抱着一个黑人女生

translation.en: doesn't mean you get to Miley Cyrus our pain, a'ight?
translation.zh:
不代表你能像麦莉希拉一样无礼闯入
评论我们的痛苦

translation.en: Reggie. Chill. [Gabe] No, no, no. No, no, look.
translation.zh:
-雷吉 冷静
-不…听我说

translation.en: You're absolutely right. I have no idea how you feel.
translation.zh: 你完全正确 我不知道你的感受

translation.en: But I want to.
translation.zh: 但我想知道

translation.en: Look, I'm Gabe. Why are you even here?
translation.zh:
-我是加布
-你为什么会来这里？

translation.en: What are you gonna do, hit me?
translation.zh: 你打算怎么做？打我吗？

translation.en: It might surprise you,
translation.zh: 你可能会觉得意外

translation.en: but I don't use my fists to solve problems.
translation.zh: 但我不用拳头解决问题

translation.en: Hit you?
translation.zh: 打你？

translation.en: Nigga, I should hit you for thinking that I would hit you.
translation.zh: 黑鬼 我应该为你这样想而打你

translation.en: You know what?
translation.zh: 知道吗？

translation.en: It's not worth it.
translation.zh: 这样做不值得

translation.en: Ga--
translation.zh: 加…

translation.en: Sam... I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 萨姆 对不起

translation.en: Everything that's going-- Sam.
translation.zh:
-所有事会…萨姆
-萨姆 你还好吗？

translation.en: -[Joelle] Sam, you okay? -[woman] Turn it up.
translation.zh:
-所有事会…萨姆
-萨姆 你还好吗？ 声音调大

translation.en: [woman on TV] Daddy? But I buried you on Tuesday.
translation.zh: 爸爸？我周二才埋葬了你

translation.en: Holla if you need me, girl!
translation.zh: 需要我就叫我 姑娘

translation.en: Ooh, shit!
translation.zh: 见鬼

translation.en: Hey, are you all right?
translation.zh:
-你还好吗？
-我没事

translation.en: Yeah, I'm fine. I'm sorry to embarrass you in front of all your friends.
translation.zh:
-你还好吗？
-我没事 抱歉在你朋友面前让你出丑了

translation.en: Oh, so you felt like the odd man out for two minutes.
translation.zh: 才两分钟你就觉得格格不入

translation.en: Guess what. I feel like that every day on this campus.
translation.zh:
你猜怎样？
我每天在校园都是这种感受

translation.en: Yes, society sucks, but I would never let my friends
translation.zh:
对 社会很差劲
但我永远不会让我的朋友

translation.en: make you feel you didn't belong in my world.
translation.zh: 让你感觉你不属于我的世界

translation.en: Oh, and don't worry. I'm gonna delete the post.
translation.zh: 别担心 我会把发的照片删掉

translation.en: Sam?
translation.zh: 萨姆？

translation.en: Can we talk?
translation.zh: （加载讽刺语） 我们能谈谈吗？

translation.en: Wait, you hacked into Dean Fairbanks' computer?
translation.zh:
等等 你黑了
费尔班克斯院长的电脑？

translation.en: That's a thing that can happen?
translation.zh: 可以办到吗？

translation.en: Some CS major ran a redirected shell script,
translation.zh:
计算机专业的人
用重新定向的脚本程序

translation.en: analyzed the active network interface, and routed...
translation.zh: 分析主动网络接口 然后选择路径…

translation.en: Yes, it's a thing that can happen.
translation.zh: 对 可以办到

translation.en: What's this got to do with me?
translation.zh: 这和我有什么关系？

translation.en: Sam...
translation.zh: 萨姆…

translation.en: we have hard evidence that someone broke into Pastiche's Facebook account
translation.zh:
我们有确凿证据证明
有人黑进了《临摹》的社交网站账号

translation.en: and sent out an invite for the blackface party.
translation.zh: 并发出了黑脸派对的邀请

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 见鬼

translation.en: My editor wants to run with the story as soon as possible, but...
translation.zh:
我的主编希望
尽快报道这件事 但是…

translation.en: if someone else breaks it before we do...
translation.zh: 如果在我们报道前 有人先公开

translation.en: You know? You'd ruin your own scoop?
translation.zh:
-明白吗？
-你会毁了你自己的独家新闻

translation.en: I guess I just don't like the idea of telling someone else's truth.
translation.zh: 我想我只是不喜欢说出其他人的真相

translation.en: Sam! I'm so glad you're here.
translation.zh: 萨姆 真高兴你来了

translation.en: I just need you to leave immediately.
translation.zh: 我只是…我需要你马上离开

translation.en: What are you talking about? What's she doing here?
translation.zh: 你说什么呢？她在这里做什么？

translation.en: Listen, I'm just filling your time slot with Dear Abigail
translation.zh:
听着 我用《亲爱的阿比盖尔》
填补了你的时间段

translation.en: until this whole blackface controversy blows over.
translation.zh: 直到这场黑脸论战平息

translation.en: Dear Abigail? I'm getting complaints from all over.
translation.zh:
-《亲爱的阿比盖尔》？
-我收到各种投诉

translation.en: I've had trolls since day one.
translation.zh: 从第一天开始就有人给我恶评

translation.en: Okay, people just don't get how you can have a show called Dear White People
translation.zh:
人们只是不明白
为什么你的节目叫《亲爱的白种人》

translation.en: and then complain about a party called Dear Black People.
translation.zh:
然后却抱怨一个
名为“亲爱的黑人”的派对

translation.en: If I hear "reverse racism" one more time--
translation.zh: 我真是听够了“逆向种族歧视”…

translation.en: Reverse racism? -Really? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-逆向种族歧视？没搞错吧
-是的

translation.en: I get it. -You were just doing your job. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
-我明白 你只是在做你的工作
-谢谢

translation.en: Well, would you mind if I read some of the complaints?
translation.zh: 介意我看一下投诉吗？

translation.en: Sure, yeah, yeah. Come to my office.
translation.zh: 不介意…来我办公室

translation.en: I could not believe there's so many racists on this campus.
translation.zh:
我无法相信这个校园 -是 绝对的
-有这么多种族主义者 好像越了解…

translation.en: The more you know, right?
translation.zh:
-是 绝对的
-有这么多种族主义者 好像越了解…

translation.en: I guess you know. You must get this all the time.
translation.zh:
-我觉得你知道
-对 你肯定总是听到这种话

translation.en: -Hey, hey! -[Abigail] ...a very bad roommate
translation.zh: 你肯定总是听到这种话 我大一时有个非常坏的室友

translation.en: my freshman year.
translation.zh: 我大一时有个非常坏的室友

translation.en: -[Sam] You? Out. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-你 出去
-好的

translation.en: -Yeah, excuse me. -Okay. Sorry.
translation.zh:
-好的 不好意思
-好的 对不起

translation.en: Dear white people, wow.
translation.zh: 亲爱的白种人 天啊

translation.en: Y'all really trying it.
translation.zh: 你们真是不择手段

translation.en: I get that being reduced to a race-based generalization
translation.zh: 我明白依据种族来归纳你们

translation.en: is a new and devastating experience for some of you,
translation.zh:
对你们有些人来说
是一种新的毁灭性的体验

translation.en: but here's the difference.
translation.zh: 但区别在这里：

translation.en: My jokes don't incarcerate your youth at alarming rates
translation.zh:
我的玩笑不会让你们的年轻人
以惊人的频率被监禁

translation.en: or make it unsafe for you to walk around your own neighborhoods.
translation.zh:
或是让你走在自己的社区里
都不觉得安全

translation.en: But yours do.
translation.zh: 但你们的玩笑会

translation.en: When you mock or belittle us, you enforce an existing system.
translation.zh:
当你们嘲笑或贬低我们时
你们会加强现有的体系

translation.en: Cops everywhere staring down the barrel of a gun at a Black man
translation.zh: 各地的警察举着枪对准黑人时

translation.en: don't see a human being.
translation.zh: 他们看到的不是人类

translation.en: They see a caricature...
translation.zh: 他们看到的是讽刺画

translation.en: a thug...
translation.zh: 恶棍

translation.en: A nigger. A nigger.
translation.zh: 黑鬼…

translation.en: So... nah!
translation.zh: 所以 不行

translation.en: You don't get to show up in a Halloween costume version of us
translation.zh:
你们不能打扮成我们
参加万圣节派对

translation.en: and claim irony or ignorance,
translation.zh: 宣称这是讽刺或无知

translation.en: not anymore.
translation.zh: 不能再这样

translation.en: Before this party... a POC on this campus
translation.zh:
在这场派对之前
校园里任何一个有色人种

translation.en: couldn't even think the word "racism" without being accused of crying wolf.
translation.zh:
哪怕只是想想“种族歧视”
都会被指责是夸大其词

translation.en: But just like it took a Sandra Bland,
translation.zh: 但正像桑德拉布兰德事件

translation.en: a Trayvon Martin,
translation.zh: 特雷沃恩马丁事件

translation.en: and a Philando Castile to wake some folks up,
translation.zh:
和弗兰度卡斯提事件
唤醒了某些人一样

translation.en: this party is what it took to wake this campus up.
translation.zh: 我们要用这场派对来唤醒这个学校

translation.en: Look.
translation.zh: 听着

translation.en: I sent the invite.
translation.zh: 发出邀请的是我

translation.en: I wrote it.
translation.zh: 是我写的

translation.en: Broke into Pastiche's account and sent it.
translation.zh: 我黑进了《临摹》的账号发出去的

translation.en: It was fascinating to see what was lurking beneath the surface
translation.zh:
能看到潜藏在表面下的问题
真是太好了

translation.en: when you were given an excuse to suspend
translation.zh: 你可以有借口

translation.en: your polite, passive liberalism.
translation.zh: 暂停一下你斯文消极的自由主义

translation.en: I considered it a sociological experiment.
translation.zh: 我认为这是个社会学实验

translation.en: And guess what. You proved my point.
translation.zh: 结果呢？你们证明了我的观点

translation.en: Winchester, we got a problem.
translation.zh: 温彻斯特 我们有问题

translation.en: Oh, one more thing.
translation.zh: 对了 还有件事

translation.en: To Gabe Mitchell, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 加布米切尔 对不起

translation.en: Please forgive me.
translation.zh: 请原谅我

translation.en: #HateItWhen bae's mad.
translation.zh: 话题“讨厌宝贝生气”

translation.en: -[woman] I should say that to my roommate? -[cell phone buzzes]
translation.zh: 你觉得我应该对室友这样说吗？

translation.en: All she did was leave a wet towel on my bed.
translation.zh: 她只不过放了条湿毛巾在我床上

translation.en: You know, I'll try it.
translation.zh: （雷吉：赞同） 我会试试 （埃尔：女神）

translation.en: -Thanks, Abigail. -[clicks]
translation.zh: 多谢了 阿比盖尔 （加布：过来上床）
